sub_title: Communications manager Netherlands Belgium & France bij bp. Pride Lead bp Netherlands
summary:
A professional communication specialist, having gained experience in industrial environments across Western Europe (The Netherlands, Belgium, United Kingdom, and France) with a focus on crisis communication, community relations, but just as well public affairs.
I have a strong passion for meaningful dialogue based on facts rather than hypes and false pretenses. It gives me great satisfaction to help others convey their messages and hand them tools to improve their own communication style, in particular smart brevity, and storytelling. 
To work for a greening company is a great challenge, I am passionate to take part in the global energy transition.
As Pride Lead for bp in my region I try to help create a safe space for everyone within bp.

projects: [{'title': 'Aardwarmte Den Haag', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'description': 'Aardwarmte Den Haag (vof) is een unieke samenwerking tussen gemeente Den Haag, energiebedrijven Eneco en E.ON Benelux en woningcorporaties Staedion, Vestia en Haag Wonen. Samen investeren ze kennis en middelen in het grootste aardwarmteproject in Nederland. Ze boren in de aarde naar warm water en gebruiken deze warmte voor de verwarming van een Haagse woonwijk. Dit is het eerste project in Nederland waarbij woningen met aardwarmte worden verwarmd.
